title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 1627 - Occupancy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 1627 - Occupancy

State Regulations

Subpart 1627-1 - Tenant Selection Procedure (§ 1627-1.1)

Subpart 1627-2 - Determination Of Eligibility For Admission Or Continued Occupancy Based On Income (§ 1627-2.1 to 1627-2.11)

Subpart 1627-3 - Factors, Other Than Income, In Selection Of Tenants (§ 1627-3.1 to 1627-3.3)

Subpart 1627-4 - Leasing: Rules And Regulations Of Tenancy

Subpart 1627-5 - Rent Determination And Collection (§ 1627-5.1 to 1627-5.2)

Subpart 1627-6 - Termination Of Tenancy (§ 1627-6.1 to 1627-6.4)

Subpart 1627-7 - Standard of Desirability for Eligibility for Admission or Continued Occupancy, and Authority Board of Review (§ 1627-7.1 to 1627-7.3)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 1627

Statutory authority: Public Housing Law, §§14, 19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
